item.description:
Now that summer committments are over, we can turn our attention to meet-ups again! The next meet-up has been scheduled for the first weekend in October. Sorry for the hiadus. Hope lots of you can attend!

As always, these meet-ups are free, though a donation is greatly appreciated in order to cover meet-up websites costs.

Best,
Marianna
(organizer)
item.name: October Meet-Up!
